title: Mustache
contentHtml: Is mustache the plural? Or mustaches. What about mustachio? Who knows.

title: Spooky Season Recommendations
contentHtml:
It is officially Spooky Season so here are some recommendations for enjoying the season:

Books

  • The Dead Zone by Stephen King
  • Hell House by Richard Matheson
  • Legion by William Peter Blatty
  • Rouge by Mona Awad

Movies

  • Night of the Creeps
  • The 'Burbs
  • Nosferatu
  • Slumber Party Massacre

TV Shows

  • Supernatural
  • Eerie, Indiana
  • Beetlejuice
  • The X-Files
